name: Danger Duck
description:
A 2D top-down shooter built in the Godot Engine for the I Can't Draw but Want to Make a Game (Again) game jam.

The main gimmick I tried with this game jam is to have all of my friends submit artwork and sprites for me to include in the game. Unfortunately, for this initial game jam build, I was unable to put all of them in; however, you can see everyone's submissions in the credits.

This game is still under development, as I continue to add more and fully implement everyone's drawings.

The game is played with the WASD/Arrow keys and the mouse.

Thank you for playing.

Follow me on:

https://www.kiptoke.com/

https://twitter.com/KiptokeDev

Audio in Game:

Various sound effects from Leshy SFMaker

The Ice Giants by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5745-the-ice-giants
